QuestData.Title: You Scratch My Back...
QuestData.Description: Much better. I knew I could count on you, my friend. Allow me to return the favor.$b$bI know how you can destroy the large mana collector pylons. We shall save your dragon yet!$b$bThe pylons only work against ground targets, yet they're defenseless from above. Send your whelplings at them, my friend. The whelplings can fly where we cannot.$b$bTrust me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Release the whelplings on each of the Mana Collector Pylons in Zarkhenar.
QuestData.RewardText: With the pylons destroyed, Senegos' pool should now be re-energized.
